question.title: Order of Child node removed and added event in zookeeper
question.body:
I am watching the child nodes using curator PathChildrenCache.

I am receiving the child node added/removed events but the order is not guaranteed across Zondes.

e.g:

Below 3 steps are performed in same thread, in step3 a seperate cache listener thread will be created

step1) child-1 ephemeral Znode is added at path /Parent/child1/ using curator client1
        Thread.sleep(1s);

step2) child-2 Znode is added at path /Parent/child2/ using curator client1
    Thread.sleep(1s);

 step3) then child-3 ZNode is added at path /Parent/child3/ using curator client2 
& pathchildrencache is started using this curator client2.

In this case I receive the child-3 event first, then child-1 and then child-3.

I have checked the ZK doc but could not find the explanation for this.

Can some please help me with this?
